div.p:
The Avatar Conquest map provides the backdrop for all our battles.
Here we'll fight for ownership of provinces and sea regions.

As we contest and win battles, we'll gain rewards and upgrades for our
avatar and our armies.

Let's choose our first province. Holding the left mouse button
with our avatar piece selected, we'll drag it into one of the highlighted provinces.
This province now becomes the prize for victory in our next battle.
